price: Dan sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus kepada (kaum) Ṡamūd saudara mereka Ṣālīḥ (yang berseru), "Sembahlah Allah".  Tetapi tiba-tiba mereka (jadi) dua golongan yang bermusuhan.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحًا أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمۡ فَرِيقَانِ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā ilā thamūda akhāhum ṣāliḥan ani uʿ'budū al-laha fa-idhā hum farīqāni yakhtaṣimūna
